nodes.text: After obtaining information from a spy named Bellis, the Republic Special Forces unit known as Havoc Squad sent Captain Zora and a newly-recruited Sergeant to recover a captured ZR-57 orbital strike bomb. Although the two soldiers were unable to locate the bomb due to it being moved by the separatists, the Sergeant was able to eliminate three separatist leaders named Bol, Saphrro, and Vyru.
